name: Am I (WEB-G)
description:
This is a 2D Horror Survival Game. You are having a Nightmare, a scary Nightmare. You are just surviving and surviving. Try to Survive these Creepy Creatures.

Controls-

W,A,S,D and Mouse Button

Features-

Scary Sound Effects

Abstract Graphics

Addictive gGame

How To Install-

1. Just Download the zip file

2. Extract the file and Enjoy

If you find any Bug please tell.
